creator: hans@degraaff.org
text:
The default configuration for webdav in trunk/docs/conf/extra/httpd-dav.conf
contains a browsermatch rule for WebDAVFS. As far as I can tell this rule also
need to be applied to version 1.4.x of Apple's WebDAVFS. Including that version
in my configuration file fixed long-standing instability with the DAV for my
Mac-using co-workers.

I've extended the line to be:

BrowserMatch "^WebDAVFS/1.[01234]" redirect-carefully
